decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill your graveyard with powerful creatures using spells like Entomb and Reanimate, then bring them back into play for a big impact. Using cards like Brainstorm and Ponder to set up your draws and Thoughtseize to disrupt your opponent's strategy, you aim to create a powerful board presence with creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Murktide Regent. With control elements like Force of Will and Daze, along with disruptive creatures like Brazen Borrower, you aim to overwhelm your opponent with a fast and efficient reanimation combo strategy.

The core strategy of this deck revolves around utilizing various creatures and spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan while also applying pressure through aggressive plays. By combining disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Swords to Plowshares with efficient threats like Stoneforge Mystic and Skyclave Apparition, the deck aims to control the board and win through incremental advantage. Additionally, the inclusion of the Companion mechanic with Yorion, Sky Nomad allows for extra value and flexibility in certain match-ups. Overall, the deck focuses on a proactive gameplay style that seeks to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent.

The deck is focused on quickly milling through your deck and getting all your combo pieces into your graveyard to win the game in one explosive turn. By using cards like Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer to mill yourself, along with cards like Narcomoeba and Thassa's Oracle, you aim to win the game before your opponent has a chance to react. The deck also includes disruption like Thoughtseize and Pact of Negation to protect your combo. Overall, the strategy is to assemble your combo pieces quickly and efficiently to achieve a fast victory.

The main focus of this deck is to assemble a combo using Emry, Lurker of the Loch, Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student, Plagon, Lord of the Beach, and Nadu, Winged Wisdom. By utilizing cards like Mox Opal and Chalice of the Void to accelerate mana and disrupt the opponent, the deck aims to create a powerful board state and overwhelm the opponent quickly with a game-winning combo. With control elements like Force of Will and Cavern of Souls to protect the combo pieces, this deck is designed to be a fast and efficient threat in the Legacy 1 vs 1 format.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana using cards like City of Traitors and Chrome Mox to cast powerful dragons and spells such as Broadside Bombardiers and Pyrogoyf. The deck also focuses on disrupting opponents' mana bases with cards like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon, while also controlling the board with cards like Chalice of the Void and Trinisphere. Overall, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and finish them off with powerful dragons and burn spells like Fury and Sundering Eruption.

This deck focuses on utilizing cheap and efficient spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent while disrupting their plans with counterspells. By drawing cards quickly with cantrips like Brainstorm and Ponder, the deck can set up explosive plays with cards like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Murktide Regent. With a strong mana base and removal options like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and finish the game before they can stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to rapidly deploy aggressive threats like Delver of Secrets, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Murktide Regent in order to quickly overwhelm your opponent. By utilizing disruption spells like Daze, Force of Will, and Stifle, as well as efficient removal like Lightning Bolt and Brazen Borrower, you can maintain pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan. Price of Progress can also punish opponents for playing nonbasic lands, while the deck's mana base allows for consistent tempo plays and allows for flexibility in card selection.
